title: Abstraction with procedures Square and Cube

A programmer notices the following two procedures in a library. The procedures do similar, but not identical, things.

content.question: Which of the following procedures is a generalization of the procedures described?

choices.label: Procedure , which returns the value n + m

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain how abstraction manages complexity.
